name: Amazon GuardDuty
short: A threat detection service that continuously monitors for malicious activity and unauthorized behavior to protect your AWS accounts and workloads.
description: Amazon GuardDuty is a continuous security monitoring service that detects and notifies about malicious or unauthorized activity in your AWS environment. It uses machine learning, anomaly detection, and integrated threat intelligence to identify potential threats such as unusual API calls or suspicious network behavior. GuardDuty is fully managed, requiring no software or hardware to maintain, and is integrated with other AWS services for easy threat response. It provides a simplified, cost-effective way to continuously monitor and protect AWS accounts and workloads.
